an4.79:1.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.79:1.2: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta chedagamini hoti?
an4.79:1.3: Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta na yathadhippaya hoti?
an4.79:1.4: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta yathadhippaya hoti?
an4.79:1.5: Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta paradhippaya hoti”ti?
an4.79:2.1: “Idha, sariputta, ekacco samanam va brahmanam va upasankamitva pavareti: ‘vadatu, bhante, paccayena’ti. So yena pavareti tam na deti.
an4.79:2.2: So ce tato cuto itthattam agacchati, so yannadeva vanijjam payojeti, sassa hoti chedagamini.
an4.79:3.1: Idha pana, sariputta, ekacco samanam va brahmanam va upasankamitva pavareti: ‘vadatu, bhante, paccayena’ti. So yena pavareti tam na yathadhippayam deti.
an4.79:3.2: So ce tato cuto itthattam agacchati, so yannadeva vanijjam payojeti, sassa na hoti yathadhippaya.
an4.79:4.1: Idha pana, sariputta, ekacco samanam va brahmanam va upasankamitva pavareti: ‘vadatu, bhante, paccayena’ti. So yena pavareti tam yathadhippayam deti.
an4.79:4.2: So ce tato cuto itthattam agacchati, so yannadeva vanijjam payojeti, sassa hoti yathadhippaya.
an4.79:5.1: Idha, sariputta, ekacco samanam va brahmanam va upasankamitva pavareti: ‘vadatu, bhante, paccayena’ti. So yena pavareti tam paradhippayam deti.
an4.79:5.2: So ce tato cuto itthattam agacchati, so yannadeva vanijjam payojeti, sassa hoti paradhippaya.
an4.79:6.1: Ayam kho, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta chedagamini hoti.
an4.79:6.2: Ayam pana, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta na yathadhippaya hoti.
an4.79:6.3: Ayam kho pana, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta yathadhippaya hoti.
an4.79:6.4: Ayam pana, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo, yena midhekaccassa tadisava vanijja payutta paradhippaya hoti”ti.
